Message.Title: And if you dare to question the Emperor's new clothes...
Message.Msg: And so it begins, those that dare to question the magical change in the unemployment rate one month before a presidential election are labeled nuts, cooks and conspiracy theorists. Further we are told by the administration and their concubines in the MSM that it is totally impossible for these numbers to be manipulated for political purposes. So there you have it, those that disagree with the administration are nuts, cooks and conspiracy theorist and those that don't are brilliant. A very successful politician once said that if you are going to tell a lie to the masses make it a big one, because a majority will be believe that it would be implausible for you to tell such a whopper. He further stated how important it was to continue telling the lie, because eventually the people will believe it to be true. After saying this, I would like to send my condolences to those honest BLS employees that were forced to stand behind and support this excrement sandwich. The Frogg
